item.title: Developer story: Getting used to macOS as a long-time Windows user
item.description: It’s like learning to ride bicycles whole over again Link to heading As long as I recall my relationship with computers, Iâ€™ve been using Windows. I customized everything to the perfection that fits my needs. Whether it’s keyboard shortcuts, specific applications (like this one) that helped do my work, scripts, and more.
